blogPosts.title: Implementation of Part 1
blogPosts.content: In Part 1, we implemented a light/dark mode switcher. This involved adding a toggle button in the HTML, defining CSS classes for the light and dark themes, and using JavaScript to switch between these classes.

blogPosts.title: Implementation of Part 2
blogPosts.content: In Part 2, we created a dynamic blog section that loads content from a JSON file using JavaScript. This allows for easy updates to the blog without modifying the HTML directly.
